snippet: A new study suggests that most young gay men in Mexico City would pledge to stay H.I.V.-free, attend a monthly safe-sex talk and take regular H.I.V. tests for just $288 a year.
abstract: Omar Galarraga study in The European Journal of Health Economics suggests that most young gay men in Mexico City would pledge to stay HIV-free, attend monthly safe-sex talk and take regular HIV tests in return for just $288 a year.
lead_paragraph: A new study suggests that most young gay men in Mexico City would pledge to stay H.I.V.-free, attend a monthly safe-sex talk and take regular H.I.V. tests for just $288 a year.

headline.seo: Gay Men in Mexico City Would Stay H.I.V.-Free for $288, Study Shows
